Mod1_Description: {c_important}Hurricane{/c} has a {c_number}[{SF_9} * 100|%|]{/c} chance to make enemies {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_10}{/c} seconds.
Mod2_Description: Enemies affected by {c_important}Hurricane{/c} deal {c_number}[{SF_11}*100|%|]{/c} less damage.
Mod3_Description: Enemies who are damaged by {c_important}Hurricane{/c} are Slowed by {c_number}[{SF_12}*100|%|]{/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:MOD_SLOW}{/c} seconds.
name: Hurricane
